summary: LandingPage.tsx was refactored toward the requested simplified layout (sticky navbar with tel: link, English headings, logo fallback, and IntersectionObserver-based UPI visibility state). However, due to truncation and limited evidence, several snippet-exact requirements (UPI QR URL, full rate list details for both cards, and 2026 footer text) cannot be confirmed. Additionally, unrelated changes appear to have been made (SEO metadata, Tailwind theme token expansion), and the footer may include unrequested attribution.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the rate list shows two cards (Cleaning and AC Service) with the exact line items and prices shown in the snippet.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for LandingPage.tsx is truncated mid-way through the second card (AC Service), so the exact items/prices cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: UPI section must show the QR image and UPI ID exactly as in the snippet (including UPI ID jrg7311@okicici) and include the service area caption.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the UPI ID constant is visible; the QR image element and service-area caption are not shown in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer displays the copyright text for 2026 as in the snippet.
missing_requirements.reason: Footer content is not shown in the truncated LandingPage.tsx diff; the file summary mentions a footer but not the required 2026 copyright text.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the QR generator URL exactly as provided (including size=180x180 and the full data query string).
missing_requirements.reason: The QR code URL usage is not visible in the truncated LandingPage.tsx diff, so exact URL preservation cannot be confirmed.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; scope is limited to LandingPage refactor and UPI fade-in with asset handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Extended Tailwind theme with custom OKLCH color tokens (navy-blue/whatsapp) and other theme additions beyond the fade-in requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only a subtle UPI fade-in behavior was required (which could be implemented without broad theme token additions).
evidence: frontend/tailwind.config.js (truncated shows new colors: navy-blue, whatsapp)

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes "caffeine.ai attribution" (as described in the file summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 requires the footer copyright text for 2026 as in the snippet; adding other attribution text is not requested and may violate the 'match snippet' requirement.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (LandingPage footer described as having caffeine.ai attribution)
